extendedInfo.description: â â â â âBurpple is the leading social food guide for finding and recommending your favorite dishes in restaurants. Itâs a brand way to food blog and share your food experiences. With smart social menus, Burpple helps you save time and decide the best dishes to order when youâre in a restaurant. It is the most dedicated food social network with your family, friends, food bloggers, tastemakers, chefs and restaurant owners, all in one place. â¢ Snap & Post your delicious food moments in 30 seconds! â¢ Search and browse places from Asiaâs fastest growing food social network - real people and real experiences. â¢ Decide instantly on what to eat with restaurant Social Menus. â¢ Highly favored by foodies who share food experiences on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Yelp! â¢ Fast and seamless way to set up a mobile food blog - anyone can do it! MAIN FEATURES: â¢ Snap and Post your delicious food moments in 30 seconds! Have a habit of taking a photo and jotting down notes before you eat? Burppleâs amazing posting experience automagically remembers the date, place and the type of meal you had! Beautify them with customized food photo filters and share them to Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Weibo and WeChat in one tap.â¢ The new way to food blog. Remember all the food you love. A fast and seamless way to set up an mobile food blog - anyone can do it! Remember and organize your food experiences into beautiful collections of Boxes and view them in a Timeline. Browse and follow others and get daily, instant inspirations. â¢ Search and browse interesting places to eat, wherever you are. Browse, search and save from a fast growing list of cafes, restaurants, hawkers, hidden gems and more! ----- We take all of your suggestions and feedback very seriously to improve Burpple. Do keep sending them to feedback@burpple.com AS FEATURED ON: FORBES, CNET, TECHCRUNCH, THENEXTWEB, THE STRAITS TIMES, CHANNEL NEWSASIA, SINA, TODAY NEWSPAPER, TATLER, APPADVICE, STUFFWHAT USERS SAY: âBurppleâs drool-worthy photos have been a great way for me to find new places to dine, and new dishes to try! I find it an easy way to collate and share my food moments with friends and food lovers elsewhere too.â - Eleanor Tay, Coffee and CravingsâI created a journal for every city that I went to and posted pictures of practically every meal I ate. After 17 cities in 14 countries, this is the most useful food app Iâve ever used.â - Joanna Riquett, Passionate writer, foodie & travelerKEY FEATURES: â¢ Capture your food memories at special restaurants or cafes with your family and friends. â¢ Share them seamlessly to Facebook, Twitter. â¢ Beautify your food photos with photo filter and powerful editing tools. â¢ Organize and categorize them into personal collections of Boxes. â¢ View a a photographic journey through all of your past meals and food adventures through your Timeline. â¢ Endless, drool-worthy browsing - from thousands of dishes and places to browse, search and save to wishlist â¢ Broadcast or save a dish into your own collection with a Reburp! â¢ Build a Following and Follow inspiring tastemakers â¢ Instagram Connect - Automatically sync your Instagram food photos to your Burpple food journal â¢ And much much more... ----- Learn about our upcoming updates and say hello: VISIT US: burpple.comEMAIL US: support@burpple.comFOLLOW US: twitter.com/burppleLIKE US: facebook.com/burpple

reviews.title: Best Food cuisines sharing app for Android
reviews.comment: I am in love with it. GREAT app.  One simple request please do add a video support in coming updates.   Love it so much really - It make me happy :-)
reviews.author: Jangila Brahma

reviews.title: Overall a new application..
reviews.comment: Nice application.. but need to improve it.. boxes are not updated or refreshed after pictures are being uploaded and my wishlist always seems to be incomplete.. remembering I save quite a few places in the wishlist but somehow it\'s not displayed.. website wishlist and mobile app wishlist doesn\'t sync..
reviews.author: Karen Ngiam

reviews.title: Incomplete
reviews.comment: Very incomplete in terms of venues. So many are missing with the geolocation. I\'ve found foursquare a better app. I hope it improves !
reviews.author: Nhon Ma

reviews.title: Lovely App
reviews.comment: i wish there\'s a pc version though.
reviews.author: Christine Tomajin

reviews.title: Excellent and awesome. ..
reviews.comment: Excellent. .
reviews.author: Swaraj Gupta

reviews.title: Motorola RAZR
reviews.comment: The boxed not update.. Please fixed
reviews.author: Nicolas Hardiman

reviews.title: Oken2
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: Angel Oquendo

reviews.title: Picture tells a thousand words.
reviews.comment: The search is innovative and user friendly. Location info comes handy & ppl there should give more comment/intro why food is nice
reviews.author: Vanessa Tey

reviews.title: delicious!
reviews.comment: definitely the best app for me when I am hungry and wondering where to fill my tummy! The app is easy to navigate and users will definitely be spoilt for choice. Thank you for fufilling my visual appetite, Burpple! BURP ON!
reviews.author: Lily Pang

reviews.title: Great for discovering new food
reviews.comment: Beautiful app that helps me discover food I wouldn\'t have otherwise known about! Runs surprisingly well even though still a beta, no problems so far.
reviews.author: Daniel Hum

reviews.title: Prettyband useful
reviews.comment: Best way to profile your collection of good food and allow food discovery as well!
reviews.author: Clarissa Chua

reviews.comment: New app is awesome!
reviews.author: Theodore Felix Leo

reviews.title: Can\'t Post To Facebook
reviews.comment: App is great to discover new food & eating places.  However, always have issues of posting to Facebook.
reviews.author: Tony Wong

reviews.title: Great app! Best Food app :)
reviews.comment: Love the new-design! Really like the Save to Wishlist function, helps me plan my future food hunts :)
reviews.author: Elisha Ong

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Love the design and yummy food
reviews.author: Siu Rui Quek

reviews.comment: Loving it!
reviews.author: azuka nduaguibe

reviews.title: Scale improvement please
reviews.comment: I can\'t get the whole photo on the box when using a photo from gallery. Please make cropping extendable and larger.
reviews.author: Aster Lou

reviews.title: The best way to collect,  share & discover gastronomical gems!
reviews.comment: An app that easily allows everyone to share food adventures with friends and the hungry society in general. A great way to find new food places to dine at or browse restaurant menus through visually  drool-worthy photos.
reviews.author: Eleanor T

reviews.comment: Excellent for discovering new food around Singapore, the new hungry go where for mobile
reviews.author: Cheng Yong Teo

reviews.title: Annoying!
reviews.comment: How do I unfollow the people that were automatically followed when I joined the app?! I don\'t want them on my feed!
reviews.author: kris mendoza
